origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoAPI.get_price_history', 'description': 'This function retrieves the price history of a cryptocurrency based on the crypto code and duration specified.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'crypto_code', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The code of the cryptocurrency, e.g., UNI, BTC.'}, {'name': 'duration', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The duration for which price history is needed, e.g., 1 year, 6 months.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'price_history', 'description': 'The historical price data of the cryptocurrency.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoAPI.get_price_history, 它的参数输入如下: 'crypto_code'是'UNI', 'duration'是'1 year'.
